comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Looks like it is from the tower of the Lands Department Building (1891).  The Customs House has not acquired the upper floors yet (1899).

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: I'd agree with Beachcomber's date range...but just for interest...the NZ Loan & Mercantile Building which we see here on the corner of Bridge and Loftus streets was built in ?ca. 1882/1883...the adjoining building in Loftus St appears to have been built in the period ca. 1884-1887...the adjoining building doesn't appear in this PHM Tyrrell Collection pic, which was taken in the period October 1883 - January 1888... www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2533262356/ ; but it does feature in this January 1888 Illustrated Sydney News item trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/63620943 .

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks for the details folks - it has all been added to our collection records :)
